text: The 1936 Washburn Ichabods football team represented Washburn University during the 1936 college football season. Washburn played their home games at the Moore Bowl in Topeka, Kansas. In their first year under head coach Elmer Holm, the Ichabods compiled a 2–6–1 record, and were 1–4 in the Missouri Valley Conference. ==Schedule== ==References== Washburn Category:Washburn Ichabods football seasons Washburn
title: 1936 Washburn Ichabods football team
